properties.Name: ExperianCompanyRiskSummary
properties.Description: Risk metrics for the Experian company.

Columns.Name: ExperianFileNumber
Columns.Description: The unique and persistent number that identifies and tracks the Experian company.

Columns.Name: ProfileTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the Experian profile.

Columns.Name: IntelliscorePlusScore
Columns.Description:
This score predicts the likelihood of serious credit delinquencies within the next 12 months.

It uses tradeline and collections information public filings and other variables to predict future risk.

Higher scores indicate lower risk.

Columns.Name: FinancialStabilityRiskScore
Columns.Description:
This score predicts the likelihood of financial stability risk within the next 12 months using tradeline and collections information, public filing and other variables to predict future risk.

Higher scores indicate lower risk.

Columns.Name: CompanyDaysBeyondTerms
Columns.Description: The average number of days (past terms) a business takes to pay its suppliers.

Columns.Name: IndustryDbtNumber
Columns.Description:
The industry DBT number for the period.

Days Beyond Terms (DBT) is the average number of days a firm pays its bills past the invoice due date.

Columns.Name: NumberDerogatoryLegalFilings
Columns.Description: The number of derogatory legal filings reported.

Columns.Name: NumberOfFraudAlerts
Columns.Description: The number of fraud alerts issued for the period for the company.

Columns.Name: CreditLimitRecommendationAmount
Columns.Description: The recommended credit limit amount for the company.
